sources.name: ProductSource
sources.script: source(output(ProductID as string,Name as string,ProductNumber as string,Color as string,StandardCost as string,ListPrice as string,Size as string,Weight as string,ProductCategoryID as string,ProductModelID as string),allowSchemaDrift: false,validateSchema: false) ~> ProductSource

transformations.name: PivotColorStandardCost
transformations.script: ProductSource pivot(groupBy(Name, ProductID), pivotBy(Color), sum(StandardCost), columnNaming: '$N$V', lateral: true) ~> PivotColorStandardCost
